mapper.update:
update OUTPBILL.OUTP_BILL_ITEMS
RCPT_NO = #{rcptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_CLASS = #{itemClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLASS_ON_RCPT = #{classOnRcpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_SPEC = #{itemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNITS = #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERFORMED_BY = #{performedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COSTS = #{costs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHARGES = #{charges,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SPECIAL_CHARGES = #{specialCharges,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where VISIT_DATE = #{visitDate,jdbcType=DATE} and VISIT_NO = #{visitNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update OUTPBILL.OUTP_BILL_ITEMS set RCPT_NO = #{rcptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_CLASS = #{itemClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLASS_ON_RCPT = #{classOnRcpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_SPEC = #{itemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNITS = #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERFORMED_BY = #{performedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COSTS = #{costs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHARGES = #{charges,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPECIAL_CHARGES = #{specialCharges,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where VISIT_DATE = #{visitDate,jdbcType=DATE} and VISIT_NO = #{visitNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
